title: Old Harrys Game
description:
Old Harrys Game was written by and stars Andy Hamilton as Satan.

Hamilton's picture of Hell however is very British and Satan himself more like a middle manager frustrated by his underlings such as the unctuous Scumspawn, the gormless Gary and others.

Administrative foul ups inevitably happen, such as the arrival of a baby and a Salvation Army member.

This is one of the few radio programmes at which I regularly laugh out loud. Utterly hilarious by a first rate writer.
